channel.title: CNN.com - RSS Channel - Regions - Europe
channel.description: CNN.com delivers up-to-the-minute news and information on the latest top stories, weather, entertainment, politics and more.
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2016 Turner Broadcasting System, Inc. All Rights Reserved.

item.title: Berlin market crash suspect may not be driver, police say
item.description: It was a quintessential Christmas scene: trees strung with lights, vendors serving candied fruit and waffles, the smell of mulled wine wafting through the cold December air.

item.title: Opinion: Can Merkel survive this attack?
item.description: The apparent violent truck assault on Berlin's crowded Breitscheidplatz Christmas market had all the hallmarks of Islamic State terrorism -- the same type of semitruck, the same high speed of 40 miles an hour, the same mass of holiday revelers -- as the horrific attack on the Promenade des Anglais in Nice last summer. In both cases, there were multiple deaths and scores of maimed and injured left in their wake.

item.title: Witness: Everybody just started running
item.description: British tourist Emma Rushton was sitting with friends, soaking up a quintessential German Christmas market scene.

item.title: Photos
item.description: A truck ran into a Christmas market in a major public square in Berlin, killing nine people and injuring at least 50 others, police said on Monday, December 19.

item.title: Islamic center shooting suspect dead
item.description: A man suspected of injuring three people in a shooting at an Islamic center in the Swiss city of Zurich was found dead near the site of the attack, police said Tuesday.

item.title: Envoy's killer shouts: 'Do not forget Aleppo!'
item.description: Russia's ambassador to Turkey, Andrey Karlov, was shot Monday at an art exhibition in Ankara, Turkey's official Anadolu news agency reported.

item.title: Tennis superstar stabbed at home
item.description: Two-time Wimbledon champion Petra Kvitova has been injured during a robbery in her apartment in the Czech Republic Tuesday, police have confirmed.

item.title: Six months on, Brits stand by EU vote
item.description: British voters would repeat their decision to leave the European Union if the "Brexit" referendum were held today, according to a new CNN/ComRes poll released Monday.

item.title: How long will Trump's Russian honeymoon last?
item.description: In the 25 years since the fall of the Soviet Union, the US-Russia relationship has waxed and waned. But could President-elect Donald Trump's campaign bromance with the Russia leader be about to change that?

item.title: France: Train attack suspect talks with authorities
item.description: The alleged ISIS terrorist charged with launching a gun attack on a high-speed train last year that was thwarted by three Americans has finally started cooperating with French authorities, a source close to the investigation tells CNN.

item.title: UK allows 'three-parent' babies
New photos of Russian T-50 stealth fighter
item.description: The world is getting a fresh look at Russia's newest stealth fighter jet after images were posted on the manufacturer's website.

item.title: BA braces for pre-Christmas strike
Pope celebrates 80th birthday with homeless
item.description: Pope Francis celebrated his 80th birthday Saturday by sharing breakfast with eight homeless people inside the Vatican.

item.title: UK acts against anti-Semitism
item.description: The UK government will adopt an international definition of anti-Semitism in order to tackle rising levels of hatred expressed towards Jewish people.

item.title: Trump vows to reset Russia relations?
item.description: George W. Bush tried it. Barack Obama and Hillary Clinton tried it. Now Donald Trump is vowing to reset relations with Russia.

item.title: Migrant boat captain sentenced to 18 years
item.description: An Italian court has jailed the captain of a migrant boat that sank in 2015, killing some 900 people in the Mediterranean's worst disaster since World War II.

item.title: Ronaldo beats Messi as best player
item.description: Cristiano Ronaldo secured his fourth Ballon d'Or title Monday, beating old rival Lionel Messi to be voted the world's best footballer over the previous 12 months.

item.title: 2016 in review: The revenge of the forgotten
Eiffel Tower goes dark for Aleppo
Turkey carries out airstrikes after bombings
Nobel winner: Peace 'harder' than war
item.description: Half his country may not support his efforts at peace, but Colombian President Juan Manuel Santos now has a Nobel Peace Prize for pursuing a deal to end the longest-running war in the Americas.

item.title: The world's most luxurious bathrooms?
When football met eSports
Visit CNN Greece
item.description: Head over to CNN Greece for all the latest news and updates in Greek

item.title: Gene Simmons on Prince: He 'did it all'
item.description: KISS bassist Gene Simmons speaks to CNN's Pamela Brown about his immense respect for Prince.

item.title: Mysterious fireball lights up night sky
item.description: A bright glowing object, believed to be a meteor, flashed through the atmosphere above northeast Scotland, lighting the night sky and startling residents.

item.title: The crystal Bible to last a billion years
item.description: Researchers in the U.K. have developed digital data discs that can survive possibly longer than the human race.

item.title: Cricket spaghetti sold in France
item.description: This business in northeastern France is making pasta out of creepy crawlies.

item.title: What is the European Union?
item.description: CNN's Max Foster explains the origins and founding philosophy of the European Union.
